img.title: home-banner-2
img.div:
Due to the evolving nature of Coronavirus Disease 2019,
All Horizon Science Academy campuses
will be closed through May 1.

The CYSP is designed to prepare students 5th to 12th grades
in all Concept schools to become well rounded individuals
by actively following their interests & getting more education.

h5.a: Letter from Governor DeWine on COVID-19

div.a: See the full featured news archive

div.p: We would like to express our thanks to all the teachers at Horizon Science Academy for the wonderful acedemic have done for the 3 years with our son. It has been a positive loving environment with nurturing teacher, the dedicated teachers who they go to the extra miles and endless energy to help students achieve their goals. My husband and I both like Horizon Science Acedemy and would recommend to other parents.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1514698414556 vc_row-has-fill vc_video-bg-container

div.h2: Horizon Science Academy Columbus Middle Charter School

div.p: Parents can apply to HSA Columbus Middle online for grades 6-8 here.

a.class: stm-btn stm-btn_outline stm-btn_white stm-btn_md stm-btn_icon-right stm-btn_color_white

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Horizon Science Academy Columbus Middle School is a public charter school serving sixth through eighth grades managing by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

div.div:
We are currently accepting applications for Grades 6 through 8 for
the 2019—20 academic year.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12

div.div: You can check your grades online via ConceptSIS database system.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12

div.div: You will be directed to ConceptSIS database system to fill out the form.

wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Horizon Science Academy truly cares about the success of their students. HSA understands that every child can be successful and finds the way that child learns.
My daugher and I both love this school , I trust the teachers they are very professional.
The teachers care and take the time out to help them achieve their goals. And I also know that when I drop her off at school she is safe and learning to become a responsible adult.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs

div.span: Horizon Science Academy Columbus Middle Charter School is managed by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.
